explains: n. 基础；基本要素（basic 的复数）
wordGroup: back to basics n. 回复本原（尤指英国保守党提出的回复到理想生活的基本原则的主张）

sentences.en: A strong community cannot be built until the basics are in place.
sentences.cn: 只有等到基本要素都已就位，一个牢固的社会才能建立。

sentences.en: They will concentrate on teaching the basics of reading, writing and arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 他们将重点教授阅读、写作和算术的基本要点。

sentences.en: Adequate time is supposed to be spent teaching the "basics".
sentences.cn: 应该花足够的时间教授“基础知识”。
